composeLookWarning.title: Full Look Composition
composeLookWarning.description: When trying a full look, each piece will be applied sequentially over the previous image, creating a final composition.
composeLookWarning.dressConflict: This look contains a dress along with other upper/lower pieces. The dress will be prioritized in the final composition as it covers the entire body.
composeLookWarning.qualityDesc: There may be slight variation in looks with many pieces
composeLookWarning.failuresDesc: If a piece fails, you can try again
composeLookWarning.layerOrder: Pieces will be applied in order: pants ‚Üí tops ‚Üí dresses ‚Üí coats
